SELECT CASE WHEN basemsg.NAME IS NULL OR basemsg.NAME = '' THEN muser.nickname ELSE basemsg.NAME END AS khname, muser.headimg, chat.userid AS userid, COUNT( CASE WHEN `readflag` = '0' AND type = '2' THEN id ELSE NULL END ) AS unread, SUBSTRING_INDEX( GROUP_CONCAT( intime, content ORDER BY intime DESC SEPARATOR '|*|*|-+|' ), '|*|*|-+|', 1 ) content FROM smart_com_kj_chat AS chat LEFT JOIN smart_com_kj_custom_basemsg AS basemsg ON basemsg.comid = #{comid} AND chat.userid = basemsg.userid LEFT JOIN smart_com_muser AS muser ON muser.comid = #{comid} AND muser.userid = chat.userid AND muser.STATUS = '0' WHERE chat.empno = #{empno} AND chat.comid = #{comid} GROUP BY userid ORDER BY content DESC
